scripts.copy: npm run copy-tinymce; npm run copy-tinymce-language; npm run copy-svg4everybody;
scripts.copy-jquery: yarn copy-jquery-core && yarn copy-jquery-migrate && yarn copy-jquery-json && yarn copy-jquery-validation
scripts.copy-jquery-core: cp -rf node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.js mt-static/jquery/ && cp -rf node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.* mt-static/jquery/
scripts.copy-tinymce: cp -rf node_modules/tinymce/*.js node_modules/tinymce/themes node_modules/tinymce/skins node_modules/tinymce/plugins node_modules/tinymce/icons node_modules/tinymce/license.txt mt-static/plugins/TinyMCE5/tiny_mce/
scripts.copy-codemirror: cp -rf node_modules/codemirror/addon node_modules/codemirror/keymap node_modules/codemirror/lib node_modules/codemirror/mode node_modules/codemirror/theme mt-static/codemirror/
